info.title: IF2BAF API
info.description: Interface to access Infosystems Business Application Framework

get.description: Returns all acknowledgments that match the parameters.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries which were added/edited after a specific datetime.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries which were added/edited after the provided change id.

parameters.name: objectType
parameters.description: Retrieves the acknowledgments for all objects with the specified type.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: Retrieves the acknowledgments for all objects with the specified identifier. Should be used in combination with objectType.

parameters.name: acknowledgeStatusCode
parameters.description: Retrieves the acknowledgments with the specified status. (1360100: Push pending, 1360110: Get pending, 1360200: Confirmation pending, 1360300: Confirmed, 1360400: Confirmed with error).

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.

put.summary: Updates the status of the acknowledgments.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

requestBody.description: The list of acknowledgments to update or create.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Get all entries which were added or edited since the date time specified.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Get all entries which were added or edited since the change id specified.

parameters.name: codeTypeId
parameters.description: Get the entries of the specified code type.

parameters.name: codeNo
parameters.description: Get the entries of the specified code number.

parameters.name: companyNo
parameters.description: Get the entries with the specified company number.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

parameters.name: includeDetails
parameters.description: Defines if code details are included in the response.

parameters.name: includeLocalizations
parameters.description: Defines if code localizations are included in the response.

get.description: Returns all cost centers that match the parameters.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries which were added/edited after a specific datetime.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries which were added/edited after the provided change id.

parameters.name: costCenterId
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific entry by internal cost center id.

parameters.name: companyNo
parameters.description: Retrieves the entries with the specified company number.

parameters.name: costCenterNo
parameters.description: Retrieves the entries of the specified cost center number.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries of a certain origin.

parameters.name: originId
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries with a specific origin identifier.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.

put.summary: Updates an existing cost center if either internal or external id match. Creates a cost center if neither internal nor external id is provided or no matching record could be found.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

requestBody.description: The cost center to create or update.

get.summary: Gets a document with additional information.
get.description: Gets a document for the sent identification.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: documentGuid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a document.

parameters.name: dataFormat
parameters.description: The format the document needs to be sent. Either Base64 or Binary.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

requestBody.description: The document information to update or create.

delete.description: Removes a document from the database for the sent identification.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: documentGuid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a document.

get.summary: Gets the content of a document.
get.description: Gets the Content of a document for the sent identification. Use this call to directly show a file.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: documentGuid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a document.

200.description: Document as a binary stream. The header contains all the information about the file for a web browser to display or download the file correctly using standard headers.

get.description: Returns all fixed assets that match the parameters.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries which were added/edited after a specific datetime.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries which were added/edited after the provided change id.

parameters.name: fixedAssetId
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific entry by internal fixed asset id.

parameters.name: companyNo
parameters.description: Retrieves the entries with the specified company number.

parameters.name: fixedAssetNo
parameters.description: Retrieves the entries of the specified fixed asset number.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries of a certain origin.

parameters.name: originId
parameters.description: Retrieves all entries with a specific origin identifier.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.

put.summary: Updates an existing fixed asset if either internal or external id match. Creates a fixed asset if neither internal nor external id is provided or no matching record could be found.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

requestBody.description: The fixed asset to create or update.

get.description: Returns all matching branches of the item-structure.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Get all entries which were added or edited since the date time specified.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Get all entries which were added or edited since the change id specified.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical Id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: Optional search string for looking up a record within name and search term fields.

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Get all the entities which were added/edited after a specific datetime.

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeId
parameters.description: Get all the entities which were added/edited after the provided change id.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific record by internal order id.

parameters.name: externalOrderId
parameters.description: Retrieve a specific record by external order id.

parameters.name: orderType
parameters.description: Get all the entities of a certain order type. (M: Material P: Production V: Sales E: Purchase A: Other).

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Get all the entities of a certain origin.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.

put.summary: Updates an existing base order if either internal or external id match. Creates a base order if neither internal nor external id is provided or no matching record could be found.
put.description: Updates an existing order if either internal or external id match. Creates an order if neither internal nor external id is provided or no matching record could be found.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-System
parameters.description: Identifying the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Requesting-User
parameters.description: Identifying the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: Optional technical id (GUID) for call identification.

parameters.name: X-Client-Type
parameters.description: Optional client type calling the service.

requestBody.description: The order to update or create.

acknowledgmentId.description: Gets the unique identifier of the acknowledgment.

modifyUser.description: Gets the user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets the date the entry was last modified.

objectType.description: Gets or sets the object type of the acknowledgment.

objectId.description: Gets or sets the object id of the acknowledgment.

changeId.description: Gets or sets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

acknowledgeStatusCode.description: Gets or sets the acknowledge status code of the acknowledgment.

lastInitialUser.description: Gets the user who set the acknowledgment in status `initial`.

lastInitialDate.description: Gets the date and time the acknowledgment was set in status `initial`.

deliveredAt.description: Gets the date and time the acknowledgment was set in status `delivered`.

confirmedAt.description: Gets the date and time the acknowledgment was set in status `confirmed` or status `confirmed with error`.

confirmationError.description: Gets or sets the confirmation error message.

attributeValueId.description: Gets internal identification of attribute value.

attributeDefinitionId.description: Gets or sets internal identification of attribute definition.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

sortNo.description: Gets position within the attribute value set.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

textValue.description:
Gets or sets a string value.
Whether Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.TextValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.NumberValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.DateValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.BoolValue or Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.CodeValue actually has a value depends on the definition of the attribute.

numberValue.description:
Gets or sets number or decimal value.
Whether Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.TextValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.NumberValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.DateValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.BoolValue or Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.CodeValue actually has a value depends on the definition of the attribute.

dateValue.description:
Gets or sets date value.
Whether Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.TextValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.NumberValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.DateValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.BoolValue or Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.CodeValue actually has a value depends on the definition of the attribute.

boolValue.description:
Gets or sets a true or false value.
Whether Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.TextValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.NumberValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.DateValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.BoolValue or Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.CodeValue actually has a value depends on the definition of the attribute.

codeValue.description:
Gets or sets code value.
Whether Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.TextValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.NumberValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.DateValue, Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.BoolValue or Infosystem.Baf.WebApi.IF2Baf.Dtos.AttributeValue.CodeValue actually has a value depends on the definition of the attribute.

AttributeValue.description: The DTO for an attribute value.

attributeSetId.description: Gets or sets internal identification of attribute set.

modifyUser.description: Gets user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets date the entry was last modified.

attributeValues.description: Gets a list of attribute values.

AttributeValueSet.description: The DTO for an attribute value set.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this entry is active or not.

modifyUser.description: Gets the user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets the date the entry was last modified.

codeId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the code.

codeTypeId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the code type.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets the company identification of the entry.

codeNo.description: Gets or sets the number of the code.

text.description: Gets or sets the description of the code.

shortText.description: Gets or sets the optional short description of the code.

codeDetails.description: Gets the list of code details.

modifyUser.description: Gets the user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets the date the entry was last modified.

codeDetailId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the code detail.

detailNo.description: Gets or sets the number of the code detail.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets the company identification of the entry.

value.description: Gets or sets textual representation of the value of the code detail.

valueNumeric.description: Gets or sets numeric representation of the value of the code detail, if the value is numeric.

isoLanguage.description: Gets or sets the ISO 639-1 two-letter code of the language.

text.description: Gets or sets the translated description of the code.

shortText.description: Gets or sets the optional translated short description of the code.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

modifyUser.description: Gets the user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets the date the entry was last modified.

origin.description: Gets the system of the origin of the entry.

originId.description:
Gets or sets the system of origin. - This id must be unique within the origin.
As Id it is recommended to use either the primary key of the foreign system or a global unique identifier.

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this entry is active or not.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets the number of the cost center.

costCenterName.description: Gets or sets the name of the cost center.

accountAssignmentGroupCode.description: Gets or sets the account assignment group.

CostCenter.description: The DTO for a cost center.

origin.description: Gets the origin of the entry.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets the company identification of the entry.

documentGuid.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the document. Has to be a valid GUID.

documentName.description: Gets or sets the name of the document or file. If no documentName was provided, the documentGuid is used.

fileExtension.description: Gets or sets the filetype extension of the document.

mimeType.description: Gets or sets the mime/Type of the document.

dataBinary.description: Gets or sets the data of the document in binary format. Either dataBinary or dataBase64 needs to be provided.

dataBase64.description: Gets or sets the data of the document in base 64 format. Either dataBinary or dataBase64 needs to be provided.

Document.description: The DTO for document with additional information.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

modifyUser.description: Gets the user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets the date the entry was last modified.

fixedAssetId.description: Gets or sets the technical identification of the entry.

origin.description: Gets the system of the origin of the entry.

originId.description:
Gets or sets the system of origin. - This Id must be unique within the origin.
As Id it is recommended to use either the Primary Key of the foreign system or a Global Unique Identifier.

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this entry is active or not.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

fixedAssetNo.description: Gets or sets the number of the fixed asset.

fixedAssetName.description: Gets or sets the name of the fixed asset.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets cost center number of the fixed asset.

FixedAsset.description: The DTO for a fixed asset.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this entry is active or not.

modifyUser.description: Gets the user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets the date the entry was last modified.

itemCategoryCode.description: Gets or sets the C130 - item category code. Used to separate the items of the different modules.

itemCategoryName.description: Gets or sets the description of the item category.

itemMainGroups.description: Gets the list of item main groups for the item category.

localizations.description: Gets translations of the item category.

isoLanguage.description: Gets or sets the ISO 639-1 two-letter code of the language.

itemCategoryName.description: Gets or sets the translated description of the item category.

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this entry is active or not.

modifyUser.description: Gets the user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets the date the entry was last modified.

itemGroupId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the item group.

itemGroupName.description: Gets or sets the description of the item group.

sortNo.description: Gets or sets the position within the item main group.

localizations.description: Gets translations of the item group.

ItemGroup.description: Represents an item group for the items.

isoLanguage.description: Gets or sets the ISO 639-1 two-letter code of the language.

itemGroupName.description: Gets or sets the translated description of the item group.

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this entry is active or not.

modifyUser.description: Gets the user who last modified the entry.

modifyDate.description: Gets the date the entry was last modified.

itemMainGroupId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the item main group.

itemMainGroupName.description: Gets or sets the description of the item main group.

sortNo.description: Gets or sets the position within the item category.

itemGroups.description: Gets the list of item groups for the item main groups.

localizations.description: Gets translations of the item main group.

ItemMainGroup.description: Represents an item main group for the items.

isoLanguage.description: Gets or sets the ISO 639-1 two-letter code of the language.

itemMainGroupName.description: Gets or sets the translated description of the item main group.

ItemMainGroupLocalization.description: Translation of the item main group.

changeId.description: Gets change identification of the entry.

changeDate.description: Gets change date of the entry.

orderId.description: Gets or sets technical identification of the entry.

origin.description: Gets the system of the origin of the order.

externalOrderId.description:
Gets or sets third-party order id - This id must be unique within the origin (origin field).
As id it is recommended to use either the primary key of the foreign system or a GUID (Global Unique Identifier).

orderNo.description: Gets or sets the order to be booked in accounting. This is the actual order number of the order.

companyNo.description: Gets or sets company identification of the entry.

description.description: Gets or sets a short description / title of the order.

orderType.description: Gets or sets the type of the order.

orderStatus.description: Gets or sets code that identifies the current status of the order.

businessPartnerAddressId.description: Gets or sets reference to the business partner address within performis.

responsiblePerson.description: Gets or sets name or designation of the person responsible.

costCenterNo.description: Gets or sets cost center number of the order.

costUnitNo.description: Gets or sets cost unit number of the order.

salesChannelNo.description: Gets or sets the sale channel.

isCostAccountingOrder.description: Gets or sets is it a cost accounting order?.

chargingType.description: Gets or sets whether the order is reallocated. KT: cost unit KS: cost center AU: order.

budgetCharging.description: Gets or sets whether the order is relevant to the budget.

orderDate.description: Gets or sets date the order was placed.

currency.description: Gets or sets currency as ISO code.

isManualPostable.description: Gets or sets whether the order can be booked in accounting?.
